caption.center: LOUIS A. O'DONNELL and CAROL D. O'DONNELL, Plaintiffs Below,
Appellants, v. THOMAS A. LILLY and NIXON UNIFORM SERVICE, INC.,

opinion.posture: Court Below: Superior Court of the State of Delaware in and for New Castle County, C.A. No. 01C-10-291
opinion.panel: Before BERGER, STEELE and JACOBS, Justices.
opinion.opinion_text:
This 28th day of October, 2003, the Court, having considered this matter on the briefs of the parties, and having concluded that the same should be affirmed on the basis of and for the reasons assigned by the Superior Court in its order dated May 20, 2003,
NOW, THEREFORE, IT IS HEREBY ORDERED that the judgment of the Superior Court be, and the same hereby is AFFIRMED.
